titles.title: Pilot Butte Power Plant Conveyance Act
Pilot Butte Power Plant Conveyance Act
Pilot Butte Power Plant Conveyance Act
Pilot Butte Power Plant Conveyance Act
To direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the Midvale Irrigation District the Pilot Butte Power Plant in the State of Wyoming, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water, Wildlife, and Fisheries.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Subcommittee on Water, Wildlife, and Fisheries Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.
Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 118-367.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 300.

action.text: Mr. Westerman moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 3415.

At the conclusion of debate, the chair put the question on the motion to suspend the rules. Mr. Westerman objected to the vote on the grounds that a quorum was not present. Further proceedings on the motion were postponed. The point of no quorum was considered as withdrawn.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Discharged, Markup By, Referred To

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.activity: Discharged, Hearings By (Subcommittee), Hearings By (Subcommittee), Referral

bill.summary:
Pilot Butte Power Plant Conveyance Act
This bill directs the Bureau of Reclamation to negotiate with the Midvale Irrigation District in Wyoming to enter into an agreement to convey the Pilot Butte Power Plant and its facilities from Reclamation to the irrigation district.
